page.title: 07LEISURE IN WILLINGDON
page.content: Children spend more time watching television than doing any other leisure activity,11 hours 40 mins per week.No one thought watching television was the most enjoyable activity. This is the order of preferred leisure activity: 1 Sport, 2 Play with friends, 3 Use Computer, 4 Hobbies, 5 Listen to music, 6 Reading. Adults also spend most time watching television,an average of 12 hours 40 mins per week,but preferred these activities: 1 Sport, 2 Walking, 3 Gardening 4 Hobbies, 5 Watching television. The Downs are not used very often or by very many of the local inhabitants. Half of the people questioned used the Downs less than once a month,those that walked on the Downs spent an average of 1 hour 10 mins per walk.
